table.name: vtiger_bank
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bank` ( `bankid` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `bankno` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `bank_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `manager_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `main_phone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `other_phone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `business_hours` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `officer_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `fax` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `main_email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `alt_email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bank_website` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bic` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bankid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_bankcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bankcf` ( `bankid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bankid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
